name: waitron
description: Monster child of callback and semaphore without any promises

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run -s test && npm run -s checkStyle
scripts.benchmarks: (INFO=1 npm run -s benchmark0holders && npm run -s benchmark5holders && npm run -s benchmark15holders && npm run -s benchmark29holders) > ./reports/benchmarks.txt
scripts.postbenchmarks: cat ./reports/benchmarks.txt && echo '' && echo 'Benchmark results saved to `reports/benchmarks.txt`'
scripts.checkStyle: eslint index.js lib/** test/** > ./reports/eslint.txt || echo 'ESLint results saved to `reports/eslint.txt`' && cat ./reports/eslint.txt
scripts.postcheckCoverage: mv ./coverage ./reports/coverage && echo Coverage results saved to '`reports/coverage/index.html`'
scripts.checkAudit: npm shrinkwrap && npm audit > ./reports/audit.log || cat ./reports/audit.log; rm npm-shrinkwrap.json

author: Marcin Konicki (https://ahwayakchih.neoni.net)
